title: Lean / QuantConnect
content:
# Lean Engine (QuantConnect)

LEAN is an open-source algorithmic trading engine built in C# but supports Python. It powers the QuantConnect platform.

## Key Features
- **Cloud & Local**: Develop locally, deploy to cloud.
- **Universe Selection**: Dynamic selection of assets (e.g., top 500 by dollar volume).
- **Alpha Model**: Separation of Alpha (signals) and Portfolio Construction.

## Basic Structure
Inherit from `QCAlgorithm`.
code:
# from AlgorithmImports import *

# class BasicTemplateAlgorithm(QCAlgorithm):
